description: NASA-backed astronomers have identified HIP 67522 b, a Jupiter-sized planet orbiting extremely close to its star, causing massive magnetic explosions. For the first time, a planet has been shown to trigger solar flares on its host star, highlighting a new era in exoplanet and stellar magnetic research.
title: A Planet with a Death Wish: How HIP 67522 b Is Forcing Its Star to Explode

description: Watch Jagamerigina Satyam, the bold Telugu drama exploring justice and truth, streaming on Aha Tamil from July 5. With strong performances and a compelling legal plot, it’s a must-watch for fans of real-world inspired storytelling. Catch Neelima and team deliver a standout performance in this gripping narrative.
title: Jagamerigina Satyam OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Telugu Legal Drama Online?

description: A new computer-modeling study reveals that dust devils on Mars—swirling columns of dust and air—may become electrically charged enough to spark lightning-like discharges. Led by researcher Varun Sheel, the study simulates how dry Martian conditions and frictional collisions between dust grains can generate strong electric fields inside these vortices. These charged whirlwinds pose potential risks to Mars rovers, as electrified dust may cling to solar panels, wheels, and antennas, reducing power and disrupting communications. NASA’s Perseverance rover may have already detected a small electrical discharge during a dust devil encounter. The findings highlight the need for robust, dust-resistant designs in future Mars surface missions.
title: Mars Dust Devils May Spark Lightning, Might Pose Risks to Rovers: Study

description: NASA’s Perseverance rover is grinding into a strange Martian rock called Kenmore to study its inner makeup and potential for preserving signs of ancient life. The rock yielded clay and feldspar and, for the first time, manganese hydroxide, all key indicators of water-related processes and possible habitability on early Mars.
title: NASA's Perseverance Grinds Into ‘Weird’ Martian Rock to Uncover Signs of Ancient Habitability

description: Watch Paramasivan Fathima, a haunting Tamil thriller set in feuding villages, streaming on Aha Tamil from July 4. Featuring a unique mix of horror, social tension, and emotional storytelling, the film dives into themes of belief, betrayal, and supernatural revenge.
title: Paramasivan Fathima OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Tamil Horror Thriller Online?

description: A team of astronomers using the Australia Telescope Compact Array (ATCA) discovered five young stars in the Chamaeleon cloud complex. One is a probable tight binary system. These findings enhance our understanding of early stellar evolution and the structure of southern star-forming regions.
title: Radio Observations in Chamaeleon Cloud Reveal Five Young Stars, Including a Binary System

description: Reformed brings a fresh air, compared to the overdone dramas in the past. It is the story of a woman who is a rabbi, and she ain't perfect or polished. She is struggling to balance her own life with her atheist father, at the same time trying to help people with grief, love, and other emotions. The dramedy created a buzz in Europe, and it is all set to release in India on Jio Hotstar on July 9, 2025.
title: Reformed OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Popular French Drama Online?

description: Priyamani led Good Wife, a story of a wife who fights to revive her family's reputation and career when her husband gets stuck in a scandal. The series is an adaptation of the American web series The Good Wife. It will release on JioHotstar on the 4th of July 2025.
title: The Good Wife OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Astronomers using the James Webb Space Telescope have identified a possible jellyfish galaxy about 12 billion light-years away. Named COSMOS2020-635829, it shows tentacle-like streams of gas and stars trailing off one side—likely formed through ram pressure stripping in a dense cluster. If confirmed, it would be the most distant jellyfish galaxy ever found, offering rare clues into galaxy evolution during the universe’s peak star-forming era. Though more data is needed to confirm its classification, this discovery highlights how cluster environments shaped galaxies even in the early cosmos.
title: Webb Telescope Spots Possible Jellyfish Galaxy 12 Billion Light-Years Away

description: In a statement to The Verge, Microsoft said Xbox chief Phil Spencer was not retiring "anytime soon". The rumour surfaced after company-wide layoffs at Microsoft that affected around four percent of the total workforce.
title: Microsoft Says Xbox Chief Phil Spencer Not Retiring 'Anytime Soon' After Rumour Surfaces Amid Layoffs

description: Dolby launched its first Dolby Cinema in India on Thursday. Located at City Pride, Kharadi, Pune, the country’s first Dolby Cinema will bring the technologies of Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos for movie goers. The movie theatre will open to people on Friday, when Jurassic World Rebirth becomes the first movie to be released there. The auditorium is a 310-seater, and features a curved wall-to-wall-to-ceiling screen, the company said.
title: Dolby Cinema Debuts in Pune Featuring Dolby Vision With 4K Laser Projection, Dolby Atmos

description: The Pebble Halo smart ring features a stainless steel design, a digital display, and is available in six sizes, from sizes seven to 12. It offers trackers for heart rate, SpO2, sleep, stress, HRV, steps, and calories. Additional features include gesture controls for scrolling and gaming, as well as camera and music control. The ring is said to offer up to four days of battery life and is compatible with both iOS and Android devices.
title: Pebble Halo Smart Ring Launched in India With In-Built Digital Display: Price, Features

description: Sakana AI released an open-source algorithm on Tuesday, which allows multiple artificial intelligence (AI) models to collaborate on complex problems. Dubbed Adaptive Branching Monte Carlo Tree Search (AB-MCTS), it is an inference-time scaling or test-time scaling algorithm that adds a third dimension to the existing framework of large language models (LLMs).
title: Sakana AI Releases Open-Source Algorithm That Lets Multiple AI Models Collaborate on Complex Tasks

description: Samsung Galaxy G Fold, the company's first tri-fold smartphone, may be unveiled next week with images of the handset giving us a good look at the phone. Expected to feature a unique G-shaped fold, unlike Huawei's S-fold design, this tri-fold phone is expected to debut at the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event, alongside the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7, and Watch 8 series.
title: Samsung Tri-Fold Smartphone Reportedly Revealed in One UI 8 Animation Files

description: Following triple-digit share gains in recent years, electronics manufacturers — who make everything from Samsung Electronics phones to air conditioning units — are facing a sharp reversal as investor enthusiasm cools.
title: Shrinking Profit Margins Unwind Popular ‘Make in India’ Trade in Electronics

description: The Boult FluidX and FluidX Pro over-the-ear headphones have an IPX5 water resistance rating. Both get 40mm bass-boosted drivers with BoomX Technology, ANC and ENC support. They support Bluetooth 5.4, 60ms low-latency Combat Gaming Mode, touch controls, and voice assistant compatibility. The FluidX Pro and the base FluidX are claimed to offer up to 70 hours and up to 60 hours of battery life, respectively, without ANC.
title: Boult FluidX and FluidX Pro Headphones Launched in India With ANC, Up to 70 Hours of Battery Life

description: Google has been under pressure after being hit in March with European Union antitrust charges of unfairly favouring its own services such as Google Shopping, Google Hotels and Google Flights over competitors.
title: Google Makes New Proposal to Stave Off EU Antitrust Fine, Document Shows
OPPO K13x 5G Overview: The Strongest Warrior in the Durability Battlefield

description: Google on Wednesday announced the Battery Performance Program for the Pixel 6a. As part of this initiative, all Pixel 6a users will receive a mandatory update to Android 16. While the tech giant has already released the next iteration of the Android operating system (OS) for its phones from the Pixel 6 to the Pixel 9 series, the Pixel 6a has not been eligible for the update. However, that is now changing, with the mandatory Android 16 update for the handset arriving this month.
title: Google Pixel 6a to Get Mandatory Android 16 Update to Fix Battery Overheating Issues

description: The Tecno Spark 40 Pro+ offers a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, MediaTek Helio G200 SoC, a 50-megapixel rear camera, 13-megapixel selfie snapper, and an in-display fingerprint sensor. It gets a 5,200mAh battery with 45W wired, 30W wireless, and 5W reverse charging support. The Pro model has a Helio G100 Ultimate SoC, but lacks wireless charging and in-display fingerprint sensor. Both Pro models support Tecno’s FreeLink. The base Spark 40 has a 6.67-inch HD+ display, a Helio G81 SoC, 8-megapixel selfie shooter, and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.
title: Tecno Spark 40 Pro+ With MediaTek Helio G200 SoC Launched Alongside Spark 40 Pro and Spark 40

description: Google Chrome was recently impacted by a security flaw that enabled remote code execution, with the company confirming active exploitation by hackers. An update addressing the vulnerability is rolling out to users across Windows, Mac, and Linux. Users are urged to install the latest Chrome version to ensure their computers are protected against this threat.
title: Google Chrome Update Patches Security Flaw That Granted Attackers Access When Users Visited Malicious Websites

description: Neil Druckmann has said he's stepping away from creative involvement in The Last of Us TV show to focus on Naught Dog's future projects, including Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet.
title: Naughty Dog Head Neil Druckmann to Step Away From HBO's The Last of Us TV Show to Focus on Games

description: Oppo Pad SE has been launched in India in two colour options. It has an 11-inch display and is equipped with the MediaTek Helio G100 chipset, paired with up to 8GB of RAM and up to 128GB of storage. The tablet houses a 9,340mAh battery with support for 33W charging.
title: Oppo Pad SE Launched in India With MediaTek Helio G100 SoC, 9,340mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: The Oppo Reno 14 Pro 5G offers several top-grade features and specifications. It features a premium and durable design. Moreover, the Reno 14 Pro also features an improved camera system compared to its predecessor and comes with a new set of AI features. Check out the first impressions to know more about the new Reno 14 Pro from Oppo.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Pro First Impressions

description: Google Workspace users are finally getting access to Gems within the apps, the company announced on Wednesday. Gems are custom artificial intelligence (AI) experts that can be programmed to perform specific tasks. They have been available within the Gemini app and website since August 2024, but now the Mountain View-based tech giant is finally expanding them to Workspace apps.
title: Google Is Bringing Gems to the Gemini Side Panel in Gmail, Docs, and Other Workspace Apps

description: Infinix Hot 60 5G Plus is likely to be in the works. Ahead of the official launch, the alleged renders of the phone have surfaced online. They suggest a new side button on the phone and it appears to have a triple rear camera unit. The Infinix Hot 60 5G+ is likely to be launched alongside the Infinix Hot 60 Pro+.
title: Infinix Hot 60 5G+ Leaked Images Show Off New Side Button, Triple Rear Cameras

description: Meta Platforms has been on a banning spree which is affecting users across the many social media apps under its umbrella. Amidst the ongoing mass bans, even those who are paying a premium for the Meta verified subscription have been left disappointed by tech giant’s customer support. Users have deemed the service “useless”, despite Meta claiming to offer access to direct account support as part of the benefits of its Verified check mark subscription.
title: Meta Verified Users Claim ‘Useless’ Customer Support Amid Account Bans Despite Paying for Subscription

description: Vivo X Fold 5 and X200 FE will be unveiled in India on July 14 at 12pm IST. They will be sold via Flipkart and the Vivo India website. The Indian variant of the Vivo X Fold 5, available in Titanium Grey and possibly a white shade, will feature a 50-megapixel Zeiss-backed triple rear camera setup. It will get a 6,000mAh battery with 80W charging support, while the Indian version of the X200 FE will come with a 6,500mAh cell with 90W wired charging support.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 and Vivo X200 FE India Launch Date Set for July 14

description: Google is updating the Android TV home screen with new tabs for promotional categories, as per claims on social media. The Android TV experience is almost on the verge of being phased out in favour of Google TV, but some low-end TVs or older models still run the operating system (OS). For them, the tech giant is said to have made changes, with three new tabs joining the existing Play Next bar on the interface’s home page.
title: Google Updates Android TV Home Screen With Four New Promotional Category Tabs: Report

description: Google expanded the Veo 3 artificial intelligence (AI) model to India and multiple other countries on Thursday. With this expansion, the AI-powered video generator tool is now available in every country and territory where the Gemini app is. The Mountain View-based tech giant has only made the feature available to its paid subscribers, and Veo 3 can be accessed within the Gemini app and the web interface.
title: Google Veo 3 Video Generation Model Comes to India, Available to Paid Subscribers

description: Microsoft cancelled the Perfect Dark reboot in the works at first-party studio The Initiative and shut down the developer as part of wide-ranging layoffs at the company. The Xbox division was hit hard, with layoffs impacting Rare, Zenimax and other studios.
title: Microsoft Cancels Perfect Dark, Shuts Down Developer The Initiative in Widespread Xbox Cuts

description: The Oppo Reno 14 Pro 5G features a 6.83-inch 1.5K OLED display, a MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chip, Google Gemini AI, triple 50-megapixel rear cameras, and a 50-megapixel selfie camera. It packs a 6,200mAh battery with 80W wired and 50W wireless charging. The standard Reno 14 5G has a smaller 6.59-inch screen, Dimensity 8350 chip, no wireless charging, and an 8-megapixel ultrawide camera.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Pro 5G Launched in India With MediaTek Dimensity 8450 SoC Alongside Reno 14 5G

description: Honor Watch 5 Ultra was launched in China in three colourways. It sports a 1.5-inch AMOLED display and offers an ECG sensor as well as heart rate tracking. It is claimed to offer up to 15 days of battery life with eSIM disabled. The Watch 5 Ultra has an IP68-rating for dust and water resistance. The smartwatch features a 480mAh battery.
title: Honor Watch 5 Ultra Launched With eSIM Support, ECG Tracking, Up to 15 Days Battery Life

description: Running out of prepaid mobile data during the day can be frustrating, but Airtel offers prepaid customers a quick fix. Subscribers can "borrow" up to 1GB of data without an upfront cost, and repay it later. Read on to know more about the 1GB Airtel data loan, and how to avail of the facility.
title: How to Get a 1GB Airtel Data Loan: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: North Korean hackers are reportedly deploying NimDoor malware against Mac computers in Web3 and crypto companies. The threat actors rely on bash scripts to exfiltrate sensitive data, including browser information, iCloud Keychain credentials, and Telegram user data. Like other attacks linked to DPRK threat actors, these also leverage social engineering via chat platforms and malicious scripts or updates to compromise target computers.
title: North Korean Hackers Use NimDoor macOS Malware to Target Web3, Crypto Platforms

description: The Nothing Phone 3 was launched in India on Tuesday and the phone ships with Android 15-based Nothing OS 3.5 out-of-the-box. However, the UK-based startup teased the arrival of its Android 16 update during the launch event. The next iteration of the Android operating system was released by Google last month but only Pixel devices received the stable build.
title: Nothing OS 4.0 Based on Android 16 to Release This Autumn, Confirms CEO Carl Pei

description: The OnePlus Buds 4 will launch in India on July 8 alongside the Nord 5 and Nord CE 5. They will be sold in Storm Grey and Zen Green shades and will feature 11mm woofers, 6mm tweeters and dual DACs. The TWS earphones will support LHDC 5.0 audio codec, up to 55dB adaptive ANC, AI-backed call noise cancellation, and real-time AI translation.
title: OnePlus Buds 4 Key Features Revealed Ahead of July 8 India Launch

description: Perplexity introduced its most expensive subscription tier on Tuesday. Dubbed Perplexity Max, the new plan is aimed at the platform’s heavy users and costs $200 (roughly Rs. 17,000) a month. To entice users to purchase the subscription, the San Francisco-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm is also offering early access to new features, priority access to services that utilise third-party models, and higher rate limits.
title: Perplexity Max Introduced as the Company’s Most Expensive Subscription Plan Yet

description: Honor MagicPad 3 was launched in China on Wednesday. The tablet arrives as the successor to last year’s MagicPad 2 and sports a 165Hz LCD screen with HDR10 certification. It is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, paired with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of onboard storage. It ships with Honor’s Android 15-based operating system (OS). The Honor MagicPad 3 packs a 12,450mAh battery and supports the SuperCharge fast charging technology.
title: Honor MagicPad 3 Launched With 165Hz Screen, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC: Price, Specifications

description: Oppo Reno 14 5G series is set to launch in India today, July 3. The lineup, which is expected to comprise the Oppo Reno 14 5G and the Reno 14 Pro 5G, was initially introduced in China in May, followed by its Malaysian debut two days ago. In the days leading up to its launch in India, Oppo has teased several details about the handset, while other specifications have also surfaced through leaks and rumours.
title: Oppo Reno 14 5G Series Launching Today: Know Price, Expected Features and Specifications
